timeline.bodyText: @kevin-zhonghao @cj-chung Do we have zipkin conf in the application.properties files? We may need to remove them there and in the yaml files as well.
timeline.author: xieus
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,6 +38,18 @@ data:
     keystone.password=alcor_pass
     keystone.auth_type=password
     keystone.auth_url=http://192.168.10.10:5000/v3
+    neutron.url_prefix=/v2.0
+    logging.level.root=TRACE
+    
+    Spring.mvc.async.request-timeout=30000
+    server.max-http-header-size=65536
+    server.max-initial-line-length=65536
+    
+    spring.sleuth.sampler.probability=1.0
+    spring.application.name=api-gateway
+    # the zipkin host should be YOURS
+    spring.zipkin.base-url=http://10.213.43.187:9411

replies.bodyText: We dont have zipkin conf in the application.properties files. It maybe added by Xiaodong
replies.author: kevin-zhonghao

timeline.bodyText: Let us move the config back to where it was, along with other Ignite configs.
